players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Night 1 begins.
Charlie was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Bob: "Charlie was killed last night. We need to work together carefully to find the mafia before any more of us are lost."
Diana: "Bob is the mafia. I investigated him last night."
You: "Diana, if you truly investigated Bob, you should share what you found exactly. Bob, how do you respond to Diana's claim?"
You: "I agree with Diana that if she investigated Bob, she should reveal what she found. Bob, please clarify your role so we can trust you both and avoid confusion."
Bob: "Since Diana claims she investigated me and accuses me, I find it suspicious she hasn't shared her exact findings yet. Alice, do you trust Diana fully without proof?"
Diana: "Bob is definitely the mafia. I investigated him last night and confirmed his role. We can't afford to hesitate; voting him out is the only way to keep the town safe."
Votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Alice, Diana voted for Bob
Bob was arrested
